item.title: C# Tip: 2 ways to generate realistic data using Bogus
item.description: Bogus is a library that generates realistic values for your data. When populating fake user names, instead of Foo and Bar, you can have John and Sarah. Letâ€™s see two ways to define and reuse a Faker definition. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/csharptips/bogus-data-generation/
